name: One ball to wreck them all
name_original: One ball to wreck them all
description:
A developer needs to clear space for a new shopping mall. 

You only get one wrecking ball, make it count.

You'll need to clear 5 levels of housing to make enough space.

Good luck!

Controls

  • A - Left Paddle
  • D - Right Paddle
  • Q - Left Tilt
  • E - Right Tilt
  • Space - Plunger
  • Escape/Tab - Options Menu

 List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

The bridge/road at the beginning was from a Dokai tutorial with Houdini, not exactly the same asset but should give credit for their genius.

https://dokaitutorials.com/complex-roads-in-houdini-3/

Sounds are from Soundly, all of them.

Unreal Engine tech texture is from engine content of course =) but scaled significantly.

The sky textures are the builtin sky textures but scaled significantly and modified slightly.
